name: Joseph TAYLOR v. OXFORD LAND, INC., Appellant

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDermott, hutchinson, zappala and PAPADAKOS, JJ.
parties: Joseph TAYLOR v. OXFORD LAND, INC., Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Order affirmed.
PAPADAKOS, J., dissents.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: David Ainsman, Rosenberg, Kirshner, P.A., Pittsburgh, Pa., for appellant.
Kenneth P. Simon, Pittsburgh, Pa., for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
518 A.2d 808
Joseph TAYLOR v. OXFORD LAND, INC., Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Sept. 16, 1986.
Decided Dec. 30, 1986.
David Ainsman, Rosenberg, Kirshner, P.A., Pittsburgh, Pa., for appellant.
Kenneth P. Simon, Pittsburgh, Pa., for appellee.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDermott, hutchinson, zappala and PAPADAKOS, JJ.
